verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> of degrees אֵ֭לֶיךָ <WH413> unto נָשָׂ֣אתִי <WH5375> Unto thee lift I up אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינַ֑י <WH5869> mine eyes הַ֝יֹּשְׁבִ֗י <WH3427> O thou that dwellest בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> in the heavens

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold כְעֵינֵ֪י <WH5869> Behold as the eyes עֲבָדִ֡ים <WH5650> of servants אֶל־ <WH413> to יַ֤ד <WH3027> [look] unto the hand אֲ‍ֽדוֹנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH113> of their masters כְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> [and] as the eyes שִׁפְחָה֮ <WH8198> of a maiden אֶל־ <WH413> to יַ֪ד <WH3027> unto the hand גְּבִ֫רְתָּ֥הּ <WH1404> of her mistress כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> So עֵ֭ינֵינוּ <WH5869> so our eyes אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> [wait] upon the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God עַ֝֗ד <WH5704> Until שֶׁיְּחָנֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH2603> until that he have mercy

חָנֵּ֣נוּ <WH2603> Have mercy יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> upon us O LORD חָנֵּ֑נוּ <WH2603> have mercy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רַ֝֗ב <WH7227> upon us for we are exceedingly שָׂבַ֥עְנוּ <WH7646> filled בֽוּז׃ <WH937> with contempt

רַבַּת֮ <WH7227> is exceedingly שָֽׂבְעָה־ <WH7646> filled לָּ֪הּ נַ֫פְשֵׁ֥נוּ <WH5315> Our soul הַלַּ֥עַג <WH3933> with the scorning הַשַּׁאֲנַנִּ֑ים <WH7600> of those that are at ease הַ֝בּ֗וּז <WH937> [and] with the contempt לִגְאֵ֥יוֹנִֽים׃ <WH1349> of the proud
